subSections.title: Glyph origin
Pronunciation
subSections.text:
{{zh-pron
|m=què,qiǎo,qiāo
|c=zoek3,zoek3-2
|h=pfs=chiok
|md=chiók
|mn=xm,qz,tw:chhiok/zz,twvk:chhiak/xm:chiok/xm,qz,tw:chiah/zz:chehⁿ/xm:chioh/tw:chhek
|mn_note=chhiok/chhiak/chiok - literary; chiah/chehⁿ - vernacular (limited, e.g. {{zh-l|*雀盲}}); chioh, chhek - vernacular
|mn-t=ciag4/ziah4/ziaoh4/ziouh4
|mn-t_note=ciag4 - literary; ziah4 - vernacular; ziaoh4/ziouh4 - dialectal (e.g. {{zh-l|*雀盲}}) (ziouh4 - Chaozhou)
|w=4qiaq,4jiaq
|ma=
|mc=y
|oc=y
|cat=n
}}
